ticket.title: Broker/worker health + watchdog integration (ensure daemon is always running)

tickets.reason: Units must exist to wire watchdog/health semantics.
Broker must expose a health endpoint.

in_scope: Implement broker health endpoint (IPC) with version + readiness.
Implement worker health/heartbeat and ensure broker records it.
Add systemd watchdog wiring (sd_notify) where feasible.
Update runbook with monitoring guidance and failure mode diagnosis.

steps: Update systemd unit templates with WatchdogSec where supported.

criteria: Services are restarted automatically by systemd on hangs/crashes.
`apm2 fac services status` surfaces degraded vs healthy states deterministically.
